data.product: Birth Month Flower Personalized Small Heart Garden Stone
data.description:
The Birth Month Flower Personalized Heart Garden Stones add a pop of color to any garden or walkway. Outdoor decor makes a wonderful gift for Mother's Day, Birthday, and many other occasions!

**Personalization Information:**
- Name: up to 12 characters
- Optional Birthdate: up to 8 characters

**PLEASE NOTE:**
Spaces and punctuation count as a character. If no personalization is wanted; please place a PERIOD "." in the name's text box.

**About the Item:**
- Each piece sold individually
- This is the small garden stone
- Personalize with birth flower, and birth date up to 8 characters, name up to 12 characters
- Measures 5.75" L x 5.75" W x .5" H at widest parts
- Constructed of polyresin and sand material
- Flat on reverse side, so it sits easily in your garden or walkway
- Made for outdoors, recommended to bring inside during inclement weather
- Natural tone of the stone may vary slightly

data.description:
Our Best Friend Gift Candles are made with 100% American grown, eco-friendly soy wax, and we only use clean burning fragrance and essential oils to scent our candles. Our candles are always free of dyes, harsh chemicals and pollutants and are hand poured in our shop in Laguna Hills, California.

A clean candle is a better candle, better for you and better for the environment.

WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE:

1 - 4 oz, 9 oz or 16 oz soy candle in the design shown in the first image.

Your candle will arrive perfectly packaged in our signature gift box, complete with complimentary Hello You matches.

Make it personal, add a custom message to the back of your candle (no additional charge :)

CANDLE SCENTS:

♥ VANILLA:  Vanilla | Bourbon | Buttercream
♥ LAVENDER:  Lavender | Eucalyptus | Cedarwood
♥ POP THE BUBBLY: Champagne | Strawberries | Guava
♥ BOUQUET:  Roses | Ylang Ylang | Green Leaves
♥ WEDDING CAKE:  Champagne | Buttercream | Vanilla
♥ SPICED HONEY:  Spiced Honey | Dried Tobacco | Tonka Bean
♥ BEACH DAY:  Sea Salt | Coconut | Tonka Bean
♥ SPA DAY:  Aloe | Green Florals | Patchouli
♥ GREAT OUTDOORS:  Pine | White Birch | Cedar
♥ BLUE SKY:  Sea Salt | Ozone | Cottom Blossom
♥ HEALING WOOD:  Cardamom | Palo Santo | Sandalwood
♥ SUNSHINE CITRUS:  Grapefruit | Orange | Lemon | Vanilla
♥ HERB GARDEN:  Eucalyptus | Rosemary | Sage
♥ HAPPY HOUR:  Cardamom | Butterscotch | Bourbon
♥ ENCHANTED FOREST:  Oakmoss | Amber | Sandalwood
♥ STRONG COFFEE:  Coffee | Cream | Sugar
♥ BIRTHDAY CAKE:  Buttercream | Vanilla | Sugar

SIZE GUIDE:

~ 4 oz candle measures approximately 2.5 inches tall and 2 inches in diameter, 20 hours burn time.
~ 9 oz candle measures approximately 3.75 inches tall and 2.75 inches in diameter, 50 hours burn time.
~ 16 oz candle measures approximately 4 inches tall and 4 inches in wide, 80 hours burn time.

We ship all candles via USPS 2–3-day priority mail. Please check our shop announcement for our current lead time.

OTHER HELPFUL INFO:

We do offer a discount on bulk orders, please contact me for details.

data.description:
The traditional Kaleidoscope is made with techniques originating from the invention of the kaleidoscope in 1817. At one end of the apparatus consisting of two mirrors, is a closed section containing glass shards, beads and other reflective objects. These all move and drop within the void when the barrel is turned, and at every given moment a new magnificent image is created.

Important Facts about this great kaleidoscope model:

This model is dark and should be under a light / lamp to see the reflections in the best way (because light enters from the SIDE).
In the last image of the model, you can see what is the optimal way to look and see the inner visuals clearly.
All the objects in this model, painted with fluorescent pigments. So if you look under ultraviolet light, the visuals will glow, you will be able to see the inner visuals, in fascinating rich colors! *(Ultraviolet light can be purchased online for a few dollars.)
Amazing and a very special gift for anyone:)Can be ordered with custom engraving!

Details

Size: 19 cm long, 4 cm dim
2 mirror system
Colors:Dark brass // Gold brass
Made from polished brass, high grade optical mirrors, natural stones and colored crystal glass beads.
All Kaleidoscopes comes with a stand. There are two types of stands:Brass stand (First photo)
Wooden stand (2nd photo)

Hand Engraving

All models can be custom ordered with hand-engraved ~ names, quotes and short (sample at the last photo)
If you choose a kaleidoscope with hand engrave,Simply mark "Engraved" at the Engraving section, and write your engraving request at "Add your personalization" section.
Please make sure your sentence for engraving, not to exceed 12 words (Otherwise it gets too crowded for engraving). Thank you!

Please contact me if you are interesting in Laser made engraving ~ Suitable for large quantity orders only:)

uniqueAttributes.Optimal viewing: This model should be under a light / lamp to see the reflections in the best way (because light enters from the SIDE).

uniqueAttributes.Custom engraving: All models can be custom ordered with hand-engraved ~ names, quotes and short

data.description: This DIY Cocktail Infusions Kit is a perfect gift for adults who enjoy making their own personalized bourbon. It includes 12 natural botanicals, 5 infusion satchels, 5 recipe cards, 1 instruction card, and 2 reusable wooden cocktail stirrers. The kit is handmade in the USA and prioritizes people and the planet by sourcing materials from other small American businesses and using recycled and recyclable packaging. The botanicals are 100% natural with no artificial flavors or added sugar, and the infusion sachets are plastic-free and compost-safe. The recipe cards include instructions for five infusions and five cocktails, as well as space to review and personalize the spirits. The instruction card includes simple, straightforward instructions for every step of the infusion process and flavor profiles for each botanical ingredient. This makes it easy for users to learn about the art of infusion and create their own delicious spirits.

data.description:
Our range of custom coir doormats are a cute accent to your home which also serves a practical purpose.

You can personalize your doormat with your family name or any other text you want, making it a unique and meaningful addition to your home.

Our mats are made from durable and natural coconut fibers with a biodegradable PVC vinyl backing to help keep the mat from sliding around.

Our mats are created using a specialist printing technique that gives an extremely sharp, bold looking doormat. The design is cured using UV light to lock the ink into the mat fibres, they look fantastic and are durable; much stronger and longer lasting than laser engraved or spray painted mats.

Each mat is hand crafted by our team with the best materials possible to ensure they last.

A beautifully illustrated Children's story book with personalised rhyming verse and a character based on your child.

Suitable for one child - we can only personalise books with one name.
- In the dropdown select from a range of skin and hair colours for girls or boys (see image for colour guide)
- Select soft cover, or upgrade to a beautiful hard cover, perfect bound and matt laminated to protect your book for years to come.
- Enter Child's first name in personalisation field (max 12 characters - suitable for one child, we can only personalise books with one name.)
- On the first page we print your gift message - enter this in NOTES TO SELLER at checkout. Only enter a message as everything you type here will be printed. If you have any other questions - please contact us with a separate message.

A perfect keepsake for grandchildren, birthdays or from godparents for christenings, the rhyming verse takes them on an adventure of a lifetime and teaches them some very important lessons along the way, from making friends, respecting the earth, being adventurous, loving their family, overcoming fears, learning new things, finding happiness and believing in themselves... with a little help from a sprinkling of magic.

24 pages, 210x250mm when flat (a little shorter than A4)

Please Note: You will need to choose skin tone from the image provided within the product images

data.description:
Celebrate your mom's special day with a personalized family portrait illustration that captures the essence of your family's love and connection.

Our custom family portrait illustrations are crafted by our team, using the personalizations you provide. You can choose to include just your mother and yourself, or the entire family, including siblings, spouses, and even pets! You can also choose the skin tones, body types, outfits, hairstyles and accessories from the option photos to match your family's personal style.
The result is a stunning and personalized piece of wall art that your mother will cherish for years to come. Every time she looks at it, she will be reminded of the special bond she shares with her children and the love that surrounds her.

Whether you're looking for a heartfelt Mother's Day gift or a thoughtful birthday present, this custom family portrait illustration is sure to make your mom's day extra special.

You can choose between a physical print or a digital file, and we offer multiple sizes to fit your needs. The physical print is available in 8x10 or 11x14 sizes, printed on thick fine art matte paper. The digital file is a high-resolution jpg format and will be sent via Etsy messages.

To order, simply select the print format and number of people/pets, and personalize the design from left to right. Provide the personalization details in the "Add your Personalization" box using the template provided. You can also add requests for additional items, such as hats or wings, in the personalization box or note to the seller during checkout.

This isn't your average print. Our custom pet portraits are hand-painted by talented artists and printed on high-quality paper. You'll see every brushstroke and tiny detail, making it a timeless keepsake.Your Happiness Matters 
We won't ship until you're happy. You can request revisions, but most of our portraits are so perfect, they rarely need any changes. Each piece is tailored just for you.
How to Order? 
1. Place Your Order: Select number of pets and size.

3. Receive a Proof: Our talented artist will hand paint your pet portrait and create a digital proof of your pet's portrait. We'll send this proof to you for approval.
4. Approve the Proof: Take a look at the proof and let us know if you'd like any adjustments. Once you're thrilled with the design, give us the green light to proceed.
5. Shipping: Your prints will be carefully packaged and shipped to your address

data.description:
Etch This Out's new Personalized Easter Eggs are the perfect gift for your loved ones Easter Basket! 

Each Easter Egg features a professionally laser engraved design with your custom name or message. 

Our Easter Eggs have a flat base so they stand up, they are 2.5" tall and 1.85" inches wide.

**Product Specification**

* Material: Solid Wood
* Size: 2.5" x 1.85" inches
* Color Options: Light Blue, Pink, Purple, Yellow, White, Raw Wood

**Ordering & Processing**

We make it our mission to process our orders fast and efficiently! You will be asked if you would like a proof upon adding your product to the cart. If you select No we will begin the production process right away for you! If you choose Yes on the proof, we will email you your proof of your order to ensure it is exactly how you envisioned it. We will work with you until you are completely in love with your new personalized gift and 100% satisfied with your order. Once we know you are completely satisfied with your and we receive your approval via email- Our team will start processing and making your unique gift!

**Production Process**

Its time to get busy engraving! All orders are processed and shipped out within 24 hours of when we have received your approval of your proof.

**Shipping Times**

Please be aware that shipping times may vary from 2-6 business days depending on the product and shipping class. First class mail generally takes 2-5 business days, while priority mail takes 1-3 business days to arrive.

**Satisfaction Guarantee**

At EtchThisOut, we know your are going to love your personalized product when you receive it. However If for any reason you are not satisfied with your order, we would be happy to assist you on replacing your item or fixing it for you.

**Bulk Orders**

We are proud to offer bulk pricing on all of our products when purchasing 25 or more. Prices do vary based on the quantity you are looking for. Please send us a message about the quantity you are looking for and the zip code we will be shipping to.

data.description: This handmade ceramic lamp is part of the Apilar collection by Noa Razer. It is inspired by traditional Spanish ceramics and features a unique design with nine different shapes that can be stacked to create various compositions. The lamp is adorned with ceramic prints inspired by traditions from different cultures, creating a contemporary cultural collage. The designer, Noa Razer, is engaged in ongoing research on traditional ceramics as a cultural carrier and searches for a sense of belonging through the local material culture.

uniqueAttributes.Handmade: This lamp is handmade in the innovative studio of the designer-maker Noa Razer, which is located in Tel Aviv, Israel, and it is part of the Apilar collection.
uniqueAttributes.Unique design: The Apilar collection ('stack' in Spanish) began to take shape during a family roots trip to southern Spain, influenced by the differentiated and unique Spanish ceramics. In this collection, there are nine different shapes, from which all structures of the collection are built. Countless creation options are formed by stacking the shapes one on top of the other into new complex compositions with spectacular colors.
uniqueAttributes.Cultural inspiration: On top of the pieces are ceramic prints, inspired by traditions from different cultures, creating a contemporary cultural collage.
uniqueAttributes.Research-based: The designer is engaged in ongoing research, visual as well as theoretical, focusing on traditional ceramics as a cultural carrier and searching for a sense of belonging through the local material culture.

targetAudience.useCase: Displaying the lamp as a unique and contemporary artwork in their homes or galleries.

targetAudience.useCase: Incorporating the lamp into their interior design projects to create a statement piece and add a touch of cultural inspiration.

targetAudience.useCase: Using the lamp as a symbol of their cultural heritage or as a way to connect with different cultures through its ceramic prints inspired by traditions from different parts of the world.

data.description: This handmade ceramic lamp combines bare terracotta and glossy ceramic in shades of green, with a slight touch of orange-red on top. Suitable for standard E27 bulbs, the lamp is designed to use energy-saving LED light bulbs (not included). The bulb in the picture is a LED Edison Vintage style Bulb. Please note that the bulb is not included. This product is made to order by hand, so it may be slightly different from the one in the photo. Please allow 1-2 weeks production time before shipping.
